metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11360 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The ReadRLEImage function in coders\rle.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 has alarge loop vulnerability via a crafted rle file that triggers a hugenumber_pixels value.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11360` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.8
imagemagick-common - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.8
libmagick++5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.8
libmagickcore5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.8
libmagickcore5-extra - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.8
libmagickwand5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.8
perlmagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.8').
